effects: Your weapon attacks and unarmed strikes score a critical hit on a roll of 1920.
You have advantage on initiative rolls and Strength (Athletics) checks.
Immediately after you score a critical hit, you can move up to half your speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
You gain another Fighting Style feat of your choice.

feature_defs.trigger: when you start your turn in combat without Heroic Inspiration

effects: Your weapon attacks and unarmed strikes score a critical hit on a roll of 1820.
You have advantage on death saving throws.
When you roll 1820 on a death saving throw, it counts as a 20.
Heroic Rally: at the start of each of your turns, if you are bloodied and have at least 1 hit point, you regain hit points equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier.
